## Request for Proposal: Senior Business Process Consultant

### Background

The Treasury Board is introducing new requirements under Policy and Guidelines, which require the National Defense to assess and recognize Asset Retirement Obligations (ARO) for its Transitional Corporation Assets (TCAs). To support this initiative, we are seeking a Senior Business Process Consultant to assist in developing financial procedures, guidance, and reporting to ensure accurate implementation and application of Treasury Board policies and accounting standards.

### Objectives

* Review and analyze existing financial policies, accounting standards, and relevant documents (e.g. legislation) to ensure alignment with Treasury Board requirements
* Develop and provide assistance in drafting financial procedures, guidance, and reporting for the accurate assessment and recognition of ARO for TCAs
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to identify assets in scope and develop solutions for disposal or dismantling

### Technical Merit and Price Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit (70%): Expertise in business process consulting, change management, and financial management
* Price (30%): Reasonableness and competitiveness of the proposed fee structure

### Tender Requirements

* A detailed proposal outlining the proposed approach, methodology, and timelines for completing the requirement
* A comprehensive resume highlighting relevant experience and qualifications
* A proof of liability insurance
